title: Annual report to the legislature
context: [ยง321-195] Annual report to the legislature. The department shall submit an annual report to the legislature detailing its progress in the implementation of the state plan for substance abuse. The report shall be submitted twenty days before the beginning of each regular session of the legislature. [L 1975, c 190, pt of ยง2] Note Other annual reporting requirements. L 2004, c 40, ยง29.
